item.title: Italy-based Bangladeshis send over $1.3b remittances yearly
item.description: Bangladesh Ambassador to Italy Rakibul Haque on Friday said more than 200,000 Bangladeshi expatriates living in Italy send over USD 1.3 billion in remittances annually, making a significant contribution to Bangladesh’s economy while strengthening bilateral friendship and socio-cultural ties.
